org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.tez.monitoring

Class TezJobMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.tez.monitoring.TezJobMonitor

  • public class TezJobMonitor
extends Object
    TezJobMonitor keeps track of a tez job while it's being executed. It will print status to the console and retrieve final status of the job after completion.

      • killRunningJobs

        public static void killRunningJobs()
        killRunningJobs tries to terminate execution of all currently running tez queries. No guarantees, best effort only. TezJobExecHelper.killRunningJobs() makes use of this method via reflection.

        public String getDiagnostics()
